name: -Space Hunter-
storyline:
Kolt the bounty hunter finds himself in the great Trashopolis, a huge agglomeration of bluish buildings surrounded by a rough desert. 
It looks like any other day at first, until an evil man manages to escape from prison. 
He makes Kolt look like the culprit, making him in all respects a wanted man that must leave the city asap. 
Only in the desert he will find the help he needs, offered by none other than the legendary bounty hunter, Skar the Pumpkin.
